TopicTitle: How to replace sound of a stock part?

Articles.Content: I wanted to replace the sound of certain parts of the game (as far as I know, it's possible), but I have no idea how to do this. =/

Here ya go:

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/CFG_File_Documentation#Sound_FX_definitions

Unfortunately there's a new bug in KSP 1.1 and later which prevents certain sounds to be played. Yours might or might not work. I've issued a bug report.
